s1.title: CHITTHI
s1.description: Akshat, a young man who moves from Aligarh to Mumbai for a new job, shares a warm relationship with his mother but struggles with silence and awkwardness around his father. Misunderstandings deepen until, on his father's birthday, Akshat decides to bridge the gap through a heartfelt letter recalling memories of love, sacrifice, and the quiet strength of parenthood.

s1.title: DOT
s1.description: What happens when a Mute & Blind Boys meet? One can't speak, and the other one can't see, yet they understand each other in ways words never could. A story about touch, patience, and the Language of the heart.

s1.title: KALI
s1.description: A father. A daughter. And a moment that changes them both. When 10 year old Vaani experiences her first unexpected step into growing up, her father finds the courage, gentleness, and warmth to guide her through it. A quiet story of care, comfort, and the unsaid connection that makes families stronger.

s1.title: LAU
s1.description: In her final few minutes, an elderly devotee (Asha Sarang) relives tender memories of family, love, and childhood with a mysterious companion (Jaibeer Rawat) before peacefully departing this world.
